name: pdtyping-client
description: Client application build with electron. Main purpose is getting size and change in someone's handwriting when person is asked to write same letter again and again via graph tablet and a stylus.

scripts.push: git pull origin main && git add . && git commit -m "regular development" && git push origin main

author: Elvan Can Başaran, Doğancan Büyükçolak, Ercan Onur Sever
